snippet.title: Sable's Grimoire: A Dragon's Treasure (Visual novel trailer)
snippet.description:
Trailer for Sable's Grimoire: A Dragon's Treasure.

This game is a sequel to Sable's Grimoire which continues along Drakan's route.


Coming soon to Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/892990/Sables_Grimoire_A_Dragons_Treasure/


Created by Zetsubou
https://twitter.com/ZetsubouGames

Music by Mario Luengo
https://soundcloud.com/mario-luengo

Sprites and CGs by Shadilyn
http://floradrawz.com

Logo and character designs by Adyrn
https://twitter.com/AdyrnDraws

Backgrounds by Vui Huynh
https://vui-huynh.deviantart.com/

GUI Artwork by Kingv
https://twitter.com/EnergyRain

Video by KotoriWorks
https://www.twitter.com/WorksKotori
